text: Hi Neal! I just wanted to say that I had my assessment/ interview today for the Junior2D apprenticeship. I would definitely say that it went very well! I saw some familiar faces as well as meeting new awesome people. One of the tasks involved lego bricks and a lot of teamwork ahah!
Glad to hear it went well. Keep me posted on it. What did they say about the appentership and what it involves

Will do! The apprenticeship would consist on roto work at the start then paint. It lasts for two years I think (companies like DNEG have their separate program). I asked a lot of questions particularly to The Mill and the program sounds great as well as the progression once the apprenticeship is over
